answers.author: Gregory Crocker
answers.text:
Many of the water utilities that I work with use Summit from Data Technologies.

answers.text:
Hi Pamela, 
Unfortunately we don't have any information specifically on different utility software programs at this time. However, we have a white paper on the essentials for success for utility e-billing. icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/303647 I hope this document is of help!
Best, 
Robin Saywitz
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is looking to change their water utility software and would like to hear from other agencies that are happy with the software they currently use.  
Appreciate your time.
Pamela Muse
West Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450
pmuse@transformgov.org
title: Utility Billing Software
